WorkItem.Description:
When you have several term sets in a term set group, the export files contain progressively more term sets in each file, e.g. if you have TS1, TS2, TS3, export will give you these files:
- F1 containing TS1
- F2 containing TS1 & TS2
- F3 containing TS1 & TS2 & TS3
Â 
In Form1.ca in method ExportTermSet() in outer foreach loop the exportData string builder is not reset so it accumulates all prior terms sets for each successive output file. If you make me a dev on this project I'll fix the error and look at adding some more features.
WorkItem.Summary: export files contain progressively more term sets

Comments.Message: I also had this problem which makes program nearly unusable.  Otherwise, a great program.
In addtion it will name Groups foulty in a given example like F1, F11, F12
Same problem here to. Please fix this!
